item.title: Docker tips
item.description: Create docker container docker run -v e:/gohome:/gohome -it --name test ubuntu bash docker run -p 8000:8000 -v e:/gohome:/gohome -it --name test ubuntu bash Update linux repository sed -i s#archive\.
